title: Destined Mate
description: What do you do when you are forced to mate with someone, so your brother doesn't have to become Alpha?You toe the line to protect your brother.That's what Noah the Alpha of the Red Moon Pack was going to do.Or so he thought, until his mate came into the picture.Mitchell's task was easy, drop his sister off for her mating with the Alpha of the Red Moon Pack.He did not expect to find his mate.Noah and Mitchell have to deal with upset Elders, a slighted sister, and Hunters. Will their mating stand the challenges thrown at them or are they doomed from the start?
author: Vanessa  Sims
